description: This beanie from Loro Piana is knitted from pure cashmere and features a multicolored striped motif.
title: Striped cashmere beanie

description: This beanie from Loro Piana is knitted from pure cashmere and features a multicolored striped motif.
title: Striped cashmere scarf

description: Bottega Veneta updates its Classic sunglasses in an ever-in-style aviator silhouette. The design has gold-toned metal frames and brown-tinted lenses.
title: Classic aviator sunglasses

description: Fastening with a golden buckle, this Burberry belt is presented in leather that will only get better with age.
title: Leather belt

description: This scarf from Burberry is the ultimate accessory for brand enthusiasts, sporting the Vintage Check and the monogram pattern on the reverse. Made in Scotland from pure cashmere, it achieves its signature soft finish through a teasel-brushing technique.
title: Vintage Check reversible cashmere scarf

description: Bring a sophisticated touch to any ensemble with this Burberry headband in the brand's signature Vintage Check pattern. Made from blended cotton bouclé, it has a smooth leather lining for a comfortable fit.
title: Cassandre leather wallet on chain

description: This multicolored striped scarf from Loewe is made from a plush mohair and wool blend. It's emblazoned with an Anagram-embossed leather tab and finished with long fringes.
title: Striped mohair and wool scarf

description: This frayed bucket hat from Jacquemus is made from breathable cotton and has a long adjustable strap. The frayed edges of the topstitched brim make a rugged impression in contrast with the chic metal logo.
title: Frayed cotton bucket hat

description: The timeless silhouette of the Marmont belt from Gucci is a worthy addition to your wardrobe. Made in Italy from delicately patterned leather, this adjustable and reversible design is cinched with a burnished white metal GG buckle.
title: GG Marmont reversible leather belt

description: Loro Piana's Grande Unita scarf has been crafted in Italy from superbly soft baby cashmere. The wide design is perfect for keeping warm in daytime or for elegantly draping over the shoulders in the evening. Fringed trim on both ends makes for a playful and tactile finishing touch, while a dainty metal charm in silver tone adds subtle recognition to the style.
title: Grande Unita cashmere scarf

description: Khaite's Dante scarf will be an evergreen accessory in your winter edit. It's made from beige soft-handled cashmere with artisanal fringed trims and a subtle logo patch.
title: Dante cashmere scarf

description: Inspired by Greek mythology, the Medusa head has become the ultimate signifier of the house of Versace. The instantly recognizable motif appears on the Medusa Biggie rectangular sunglasses, made from glossy acetate with tinted lenses.
title: Medusa Biggie rectangular sunglasses

description: The Sochi beanie from Khaite will be an evergreen accessory in your winter wardrobe. The minimalist style is made in Italy from soft-handled beige cashmere and can be worn cuffed or uncuffed.
title: Sochi cashmere beanie

description: Keep cozy on winter days in Khaite's ribbed knit balaclava. The design is made from supremely soft cashmere and features full face coverage, showing only the eyes and a bobble top.
title: Cashmere ribbed-knit balaclava

description: Made from curly white shearling, these Mônot sleeves will add a contemporary touch to any ensemble. Wear them with the designer's cutout cocktail dresses.
title: Shearling sleeves

description: Brighten up gloomy days with this beanie from Ruslan Baginskiy. Rib-knit from a warm wool-blend, it features logo embroidery on its upturned brim.
title: Ribbed-knit wool-blend beanie

description: Create a polished look with these elegant oval sunglasses from Courrèges. They're made from black acetate and they feature embossed logo branding at the arms.
title: Oval acetate sunglasses

description: These long gloves from Valentino Garavani are made in Italy from leather in a forearm length style designed to keep you warm. They feature a logo embellishment at the cuffs.
title: Long leather gloves

description: This Valentino Garavani belt is part of the Pink PP collection, celebrating the contemporary codes of Pierpaolo Piccioli. This leather accessory is made in Italy and features an adjustable length and a One Stud embellishment.
title: Roman Stud leather shoulder bag

description: The Jacquetta sunglasses are made in Italy from acetate in a vintage-effect, injected square silhouette. The striking style features metal T embellishments at the temples.
title: One Stud leather belt

description: Sophistication and romance are the hallmark of Jennifer Behr, whose accessories are made by hand in the label's New York City ateliers. The Jessa set of 2 bobby pins is made with emerald-green crystals that will enhance your hairdo.
title: Jacquetta square sunglasses

description: Altuzarra's Enoki belt is a minimalist but statement accessory. The wide design is made from off-white leather and fastens with self-tie straps.
title: Jessa embellished set of 2 bobby pins

description: Elevate your beanie edit with this iconic Balenciaga x Adidas design, guaranteed to get you noticed. Made from a technical fine knit to a fitted silhouette, it features a printed logo at the center fold.
title: x Adidas logo beanie

description: This ribbed-knit scarf from Saint Laurent is made from premium quality cashmere in black, making it an everlasting wardrobe staple.
title: RIbbed-knit cashmere scarf

description: This balaclava is an iconic piece from the Balenciaga x Adidas collaboration. Made from finely knitted wool with a printed logo, the design features full face coverage with subtle openings at the eyes and mouth.
title: x Adidas wool balaclava

description: Showcasing design ingenuity, this baseball cap from the hotly anticipated Balenciaga x Adidas collaboration is made from black-washed cotton denim. The design features an embroidered logo, distressed detailing, and a perforated peak.
title: x Adidas cotton baseball cap

description: Casual yet sophisticated, this cap from Chloé will provide optimum warmth during the colder months. It's made from tactile shearling with an adjustable leather strap and gold-tone logo hardware at the front.
title: Shearling cap

description: Sweep Brunello Cucinelli's shawl over your shoulders as the sun sets on your next soirée. It's made from a plaid wool-blend in the label's Solomeo atelier.
title: Wool-blend shawl

description: This balaclava is an iconic piece from the Balenciaga x Adidas collaboration. Made from finely knitted wool with a printed logo, the design features full face coverage with subtle openings at the eyes and mouth.
title: Mirren silk satin headband
